Articles.Content: Heeellloooo everybody! Around a week ago I started playing ksp, and I just made my forum account late last night. I mostly play in sandbox mode, to experiment with stuff. So far I've been able to land on Mun and Minmus a couple times and Duna once. Kerbal Space Program is an amazing game, 10/10 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Welcome to the forums! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Glad to hear you've been enjoying yourself. Make yourself at home!
We got cookies, cake, pepsi and coke products, and some stand-up comedy on the TV!
